roleset.name: surpass

example.name: overtop-v
example.text: The one from the Provincial Assembly , more restless and uneasy in its corporate expression , was overtopped by the big face of Don Juste Lopez , soft and white , with prominent eyelids and wreathed in impenetrable solemnity as if in a dense cloud .

propbank.arg: The one from the Provincial Assembly , more restless and uneasy in its corporate expression ,
by the big face of Don Juste Lopez , soft and white , with prominent eyelids and wreathed in impenetrable solemnity as if in a dense cloud

roleset.note: OVERTOP-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
